bibl.title: A New Church at Taposiris Magna-Abusir.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Small church of the Early Christian period. It is situated to the south of the temple of Osiris, close to the south-eastern margin of the town.
GROSSMANN Peter, A New Church at Taposiris Magna-Abusir.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 31 (1992) pp. 25-30, 1 plan et pl. I.
